001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.viewmodel;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
004import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
005import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
006import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
007import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
008import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Pattern;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.pojo.PatternWithRows;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.service.PatternRepository;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.service.UserRepository;
014import java.util.List;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016
017/**
018 * Provides access (For a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current state of the Pattern
019 * Library
020 */
021@HiltViewModel
022public class PatternLibraryViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
023
024  private final PatternRepository patternRepository;
025  private final UserRepository userRepository;
026  private final LiveData<PatternWithRows> pattern;
027  private final MutableLiveData<Long> id;
028  private final LiveData<List<Row>> rows;
029
030  @Inject
031  public PatternLibraryViewModel(PatternRepository patternRepository,
032      UserRepository userRepository) {
033    this.patternRepository = patternRepository;
034    this.userRepository = userRepository;
035    id = new MutableLiveData<>();
036    pattern = Transformations.switchMap(id, patternRepository::getPattern);
037    rows = Transformations.switchMap(id, patternRepository::getRows);
038
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Returns a reference to {@link LiveData} containing the {@link List} of {@link Pattern} for
043   * observation by a UI controller.
044   */
045  public LiveData<List<Pattern>> getPatterns() {
046    return patternRepository.getAllPatterns();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Gets a {@link PatternWithRows} instance to hand off to a UI controller.
051   *
052   * @return pattern {@link PatternWithRows} instance linking a {@code pattern} with the
053   * {@code rows} that make it up.
054   */
055  public LiveData<PatternWithRows> getPattern() {
056    return pattern;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Gets a {@link Pattern} by its id.
061   *
062   * @param id {@link Pattern} id.
063   */
064  public void fetchPattern(long id) {
065    this.id.postValue(id);
066  }
067}
